Among current applicants, Parent_C is highest on my list. Waiting risks losing Parent_C to another nursery (they also rank Nursery_B first, but could move to Nursery_C next). Accepting Parent_C now secures a relatively high-priority match (3rd choice overall) and avoids ending unmatched while hoping for Parent_E/Parent_B to apply later. Therefore, accept Parent_C.
